channel.title: [PI] Potions For Donators
channel.description: I just added overload, need it for donators only, help :o

item.title: [PI] Potions For Donators
item.dc:creator: @Roxee Roxee™
item.description:
@Roxee wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Wut? You have to actually handle the potion, silly.

[code=Java]case OVERLOAD(4):
if (c.memberStatus == 2) {
handleOverload(itemId, OVERLOAD(3), slot);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This potion is for Super Donators only.”);
return;
}
break;

case OVERLOAD(3):
if (c.memberStatus == 2) {
handleOverload(itemId, OVERLOAD(2), slot);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This potion is for Super Donators only.”);
return;
}
break;

case OVERLOAD(2):
if (c.memberStatus == 2) {
handleOverload(itemId, OVERLOAD(1), slot);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This potion is for Super Donators only.”);
return;
}
break;

case OVERLOAD(1):
if (c.memberStatus == 2) {
handleOverload(itemId, EMPTY_VIAL, slot);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This potion is for Super Donators only.”);
return;
}
break;[/code]

[code=Java]public void handleOverload(int itemId, int newItem, int slot) {
if (c.duelRule[6]) {
c.sendMessage(“You may not eat in this duel.”);
return;
}
c.startAnimation(829);
c.playerItems[slot] = newItem + 1;
c.getItems().resetItems(3214);

c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, c.getItems().getItemSlot(itemId), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(newItem, 1);

/* Attack, Defence, Strength, Hitpoints */
int[] stats = {0, 1, 2, 3};

for (int i : stats) {
    c.playerLevel[i] = 125;
    c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}

}[/code]
^ I think that works?[/quote]

I’m jelly.

Vain is my hero! farts Btw, It isnt handleoverload, i just used a drinkStatPotion method for it.

Read full topic

c.sendMessage(“This potion is for Super Donators’ only.”);
return false;
}
break;
